# Task 06 — Floating action button (new record)

## Summary

Add a bottom-right floating action button (FAB) with “+” icon to start a new recording.

## Requirements

- Visible on records list and record detail pages.
- Navigates to `/record/new`.

## Acceptance Criteria

- FAB is present and works.

## How to Test

- Manual: click FAB and verify navigation.

## Dependencies

- phase-2/00-app-shell-routing.md
